column4: Someone help?  With 7.10 fresh install getting internet to work
I don't know how to get the network card going
you have your password and username ?
tourter or directly conected to the dsl model ?
open a terminal windows and type sudo pppoeconf
are youusing a bridge modem or a router/modem ? with two comps connecetd to it ?
put my nick in the same line as the rest
basicaly the command I gave you was for a bridge modem , ei one that only does the connecting and can only have one comp on it.
It's a centurytel modem with a USB output as well as an ether port...this comp is using Ether, his is connected to the USB
ah,  not sure how that works, I think it's a bridge modem and you can'T realy have two comps on it at once,  even if therer are technicaly two connectors,  you'll need a router
try looking up the modem's model in the forum www.ubuntuforums.org
it shoudl work...This comp is dual boot Kubuntu/XP, his was XP...it worked well when I was either and his was XP...so if my comp can work - How can he install USB drivers if he has the CD
I forgot how to 'run' a CD for it's drivers
does his cd have drivers for linux on it ?
put the cd in , copy the linux driver over to the desktop ,  see if there is a Read me file in it to tell you how to install
